SEARCH
Package HWSystem.Device

Class Device

java.lang.Object
HWSystem.Device.Device
Direct Known Subclasses:
Display, MotorDriver, Sensor, WirellesIO
public abstract class Device extends Object
Abstract base class for all hardware devices in the system. This class defines the common structure and behavior that every device must follow. Each device is associated with a communication protocol and has a unique device ID. It can also be assigned to a specific port.

      Unique ID for this device within its type.

      The communication protocol used by the device.

    • portID

      protected int portID
      The port ID to which the device is connected. Default is -1 (not assigned).
